short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans the current page and sends text to a local server / tablet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading the cluttered page on PC is bad. Every other readability app requires you to jump through hoops.

ReadOnPaper is different. We just send the cleaned content anonymously to readonpaper.com server, and display short url. Type this url to your tablet and enjoy. No accounts, no pain.

Content on the server is deleted after first request or after 50 seconds. We value your privacy, so the extension won't even work on non-http:// protocols.
